document.heading: Vehicle Insurance Enforcement Amendment Act of 2006

history.narrative: Law 16-117, the “Vehicle Insurance Enforcement Amendment Act of 2006”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 16-56 which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on February 7, 2006, and March 7, 2006, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on March 23, 2006, it was assigned Act No. 16-319 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 16-117 became effective on June 8, 2006.
